embed.description: **Alloy** is a **Companion** that the player can bring along on a run. This card is exclusive to the **Clunkmasters Tribe**

fields.name: Effects
fields.value: On kill, apply 1 <&Scrap&> to a random ally.

fields.name: Unlock
fields.value: Alloy can be unlocked at the Hot Spring in Snowdwell by adding 10 <&Scrap&> to clunkers

embed.title: Alloy
